moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moves.name: Eruption
moves.description: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Eruption
moves.description: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.
